result.execSummary:
The defendant Ramon Author Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ramon Author Thompson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Ramon Author Thompson was found guilty of 1st Degree Reckless Injury [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.23(1)(a).
  • Ramon Author Thompson was found guilty of Possess Firearm-Convicted of a Felony, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
BOTH COUNTS: Provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs. Pay all applicable court costs and surcharges. As to all costs and surcharges, Court orders DOC shall collect up to 25% of prison funds. Remaining balance to be collected during the period of extended supervision. Unpaid amount to convert to a civil judgment. 
- Restitution set at $0.

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor. Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

Original Transcript SENTENCING (16 pages) commencing JULY 18, 2016 received and filed.

Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in court with attorney Jodi Andrea Sanfelippo.  Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for sentencing hearing today.  Court finds State has complied with vicitm notification.  Statements made as to sentencing.  

AS TO COUNT 2: The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 10 YEARS (CONSECUTIVE TO EXISTING SENTENCE); the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 7 YEARS; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 3 YEARS.  
AS TO COUNT 4: The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 4 YEARS (CONCURRENT TO COUNT 2); the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 2 YEARS; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 2 YEARS.  
The defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program and is eligible for the "Wisconsin Substance Abuse Program".

Court orders restitution set at $0.   
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges. 
As to all costs and surcharges, Court orders DOC shall collect up to 25% of prison funds.  Remaining balance to be collected during the period of extended supervision.  Unpaid amount to convert to a civil judgement.   Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored. 

Filed,
Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence;
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.
from Racine Correctional

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Ramon Author Thompson not in court, in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Sargent informs court that there is a conflict of interest and needs to withdraw.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed and that counsel should be prepared to proceed to sentencing on the next date of 7-18-2016 at 8:30am.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 18, 2016 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Racine Correctional.

Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for final pretrial conference.  Defendant changes plea to GUILTY as to COUNTS 2 AND 4.  Pursuant to negotiations and on motion of the State, Court orders COUNT 3 DISMISSED.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.  Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Plea questionnaire, addendum and jury instructions received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the amended information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Defendant is advised he is a convicted felon and may not possess any firearms or body armor. Defendant is advised he is unable to vote in any election until civil rights are restored.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  6/20/16 jury trial date is vacated.  Court orders defendant REMANDED pending sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Filed, ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Ramon Author Thompson not in court, in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is scheduled for final pretrial conference today.  Court is in trial and unable to conduct hearing today.  Final pretrial conference adjourned.  Matter remains in trial posture, matter remains scheduled for jury trial on 5/10/16 at 8:30am in br. 35.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defense counsel withdraws bail motion, defendant is currently in custody on VOP hold.  Matter is in trial posture, counsel requests trial date.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 19, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Ramon Author Thompson not in court, in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for bail bond hearing. Court is currently in trial and unable to try this case today. Court ordered case adjourned for bail bond hearing in Branch 35. Trial date to be selected at next court date.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in custody.  Denis John Stingl for Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State filed amended information on 1/27/16.  Copy served on defendant.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of amended information, waives formal reading and pleads not guilty.  Court orders matter adjourned for status conference.  Additional discovery to be turned over.  Defense requests to be heard on bail on next date.  Bail/bond hearing and status conference scheduled for February 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Ramon Author Thompson in custody.  Randall L Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state: Malden Dukic MPD Officer.  Court took judicial notice of certified documents regarding case #01CF3594 that are attached to the complaint.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 35.  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Court orders defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY and to be monitored by  portable breathalyzers.
